resources.string: There are no books in this Bookshelf. Please add some using the menu at the bottom of this screen.
You have not created any bookshelves yet. Please add some using the menu at the bottom of this screen.
The book you are trying to add already exists. .
The scanned book was not found. You can sometimes find the correct barcode on the inside front cover. Otherwise please enter the details manually.
Unable to Connect to Google Books

Warning. Importing data may update existing book records with new information if the uuid column is not present and the id in the import file is the same as an existing id. This is usually fine if you changed a field in an exported file. If you created a new book record, or are importing someone elses books, ensure the uuid field is present or the id field is blank.
ERROR: Export (to SDCard) of data failed.
ERROR: Import of data (from SDCard) failed. Is the file in the correct place?
To scan your books via the ISBN barcode, you must install one of the Zxing, pic2shop or Google Googles barcode scanner applications.
If you would like to support the development of this application, please donate using a my Amazon Wishlist or the paypal button below. Being in Australia means I cannot publish a "paid" version. :-)
This book has been loaned to:
Selected fields will be updated from the internet. Unselected fields will remain unchanged.
This will update the selected fields as shown, but Thumbnails can optionally be downloaded for ALL books.\n\nDo you want to overwrite all existing thumbnails? Warning, this may take a long time.
Thumbnails are being downloaded in the background
Searching for the book failed. Please check your network settings.
Full online application help will come soon.
Selected fields are visible in the add/edit book screens. Unselected fields are hidden.
All stories in this anthology are written by the same author
Please confirm that these anthology titles are (mostly) correct

* Thumbnails

Adding books by ISBN is much more accurate than adding by author and title and is generally preferred. Please remember you can sometimes find the correct barcode on the inside front cover. \n\n
Please click here to access the online help pages

Select at least one field to update

This application is enhanced by using LibraryThing as a source of information about book series, as well as a source of alternate covers. To use these features you need to register with LibraryThing (free) and request a LibraryThing developer key (also free).
Once you have the developer key (or if you already have one), just enter it below and it will be used to get extra data.
This feature requires a LibraryThing Developer Key. Do you want to see more information about LibraryThing?

This feature benefits from having a LibraryThing Developer Key. Do you want to see more information about LibraryThing, or disable this message?\n\nLibraryThing information can be found in the LibraryThing tab of the Administration pages.
From time to time this application can display optional messages regarding LibraryThing. Press the button below to reset any of these messages that have been disabled.

Click on the button below to gather information about any recent crashes or other errors and send it to one of our developers. This will create a backup copy of your entire database as well as any log files. If you do not wish to send any of these files, delete it from the mail attachments before sending.

Purgeable files currently use %s on the SD card. Log files and other data are saved on the SD card at each upgrade, when you backup the database, or when the application crashes. Click the button below to purge these files from your SD card. If you have been experiencing crashing or other errors, please consider using the \'Send Information\' button first.
Please take the time to briefly describe the problem you are experiencing.
You cannot edit the system values
Your LibraryThing Developer Key was incorrect, or we could not connect to the network to verify.
Your LibraryThing Developer Key is valid.
Would you like to send this export as an email somewhere?

goodreads is a web site whose stated mission is "to help people find and share books they love". They have an extensive database of books and reviews, and if you are a registered goodreads user, BookCatalogue can export your books, shelves and reviews to goodreads and import your books, shelves and reviews from goodreads. BookCatalogue is a stand-alone application and does not require goodreads, but if you are interested you can register at:

Once you are registered, or if you are already a goodreads user, you can authorize BookCatalogue to access your goodreads data by pressing the button below. It will take you to a web page where you will need to login to goodreads and authorize this application. We will never see your password, and you can disable access via the goodreads website. Due to the vagueries of the web, you may end up on a blank web page. Just click the back button to return here!
But remember…there is no need to do any of this: BookCatalogue works just fine without it!
It looks like you have already authorized this application. All goodreads functions should be available already
There was a network problem while accessing goodreads. Please check if the goodreads web site it up, and if the problem persists please contact support
Goodreads authorization resulted in an error.
If the problem persists, contact support via Help on the main menu.
The specified book no longer exists
%1$s books processed: %2$s sent successfully, %3$s with no ISBN and %4$s with ISBN but not found in goodreads
BookCatalogue has crashed unexpectedly. Please help us to make the application better by reporting this crash.
It looks like BookCatalogue has crashed. If possible describe anything you think may be relevant below and press "OK" to send us an email about the crash. You will see the email before it is sent.

You can use this screen to customize the list of styles that will be displayed in your default styles menu. 

A green tick indicates the style will be shown in the list, and a red cross indicates it will not be shown. Clicking on a green tick will turn it into a cross, and vice-versa. 

If no styles are ticked, then all styles will be shown. 

It is also possible to re-order the items by dragging the icon at the extreme right of each row. 

Clicking anywhere else in a row will allow you to edit the details of a specific style (or clone it, if it is a built-in style).

You can use this screen to modify the hiearchy of headings for a specific book list style. 

A green tick indicates the heading will be shown in the list, and a red cross indicates it will not be shown. Clicking on a green tick will turn it into a cross, and vice-versa. 

You can re-order the hierarchy by dragging the icon at the extreme right of each row up or down.

You can use this screen to set the characteristics of a specific book list style. 

You can change the name, edit the groupings to change the hierarchy, and adjust a variety of other settings to build a style that you find useful. 

It is also possible to use 'Book Filters' to modify the selection of books that will be displayed in the list. eg. to only retrieve books you have not read yet.

You can use this screen to set the default characteristics of all book list styles. 

Most properties can be overridden by individual styles, but the default values are defined here. 

You can change the background, change how lists are displayed at startup, and adjust a variety of other settings that will be applied to all your styles when possible. 

You can also edit the styles menu, and the styles themselves from here.
A non-blank value for \'%1$s\' must be specified
An unexpected error has occurred, please send the details to support using the \'Help\' option from the main menu
An export task is already queued and must compete before this task can run
An import task is already queued and must compete before this task can run
This action can not be completed until this application is authorized via the goodreads web site. Once you have authorized this application, please retry. \n\nDo you want to authorize it now?

This will send your library to goodreads. 

You can choose to send all of your books, or only the books you have updated since they were last copied to or from goodreads (including all books that have not been sent yet) or you can cancel the update. 

If you have never sent any books then there is no difference between the first two options.
If shown for every author, a single book may appear more than once in a list. In such a case deleting one of those books will delete all instances from the list.
If shown in every series, a single book may appear more than once in a list. In such a case deleting one of those books will delete all instances from the list.

From here you can see the currently running tasks as well as previous tasks that have completed with errors or other notable events. Clicking on a task will allow you to see the events associated with that task as well as delete the task (and related events).
From here you can see the events associated with a background task. Clicking on a event will allow you to perform a variety of actions appropriate for that event.
Task has been queued in background
This is the standard BookCatalogue startup screen. If you prefer, you can startup directly in \'My Books\'; the preferred startup screen can be changed in preferences.

The selected book does not have an ISBN; it is not possible to automatically synchronize it with goodreads. The simplest solution is to: 

(1) delete the book from BookCatalogue 

(2) add the book in goodreads manually via their web interface 

(3) Synchronize with goodreads 

This will result in the book being recreated in BookCatalogue and the two will remain linked from that point onwards.

The ISBN of the selected book could not be found on goodreads. There are two possible causes for this: either the data for the book is wrong (you should check the ISBN), or the book is not in goodreads. 

If you make any changes to the data in BookCatalogue, just press the 'Retry' button and check to see if the resulting background task succeeds. 

If the data looks correct and the book is still not found, then a book with that ISBN needs to be added to goodreads manually via their web site. Once that is done, you can retry sending the book.
More than one export file was found; please select an export file to import from the list below
There was a problem starting the import: %1$s
This menu allows you to select the style of the list. \n\nYou can also customize this menu, as well as create your own list styles, by clicking \'Customize\' at the end of the list.
Resize each time they are needed (uses less storage, scrolling will be slower)
Cache resized thumbnails (uses more storage, lists will scroll faster)
Use background thread (lists scroll faster, images may be delayed)
Generate immediately (lists scroll slower, images will be displayed immediately)
Beep if scanned ISBN is invalid
This option is not available until the book is saved
%1$s is not a valid ISBN or ASIN
You may have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit without saving?
You have unsaved changes, if you exit now they will be lost.
If day is specified, then both month and year must also be specified.
If month is specified, then year must also be specified.
Automatically rotate images captured by camera
If you find yourself always rotating camera images in the same direction, try changing the application settings to specify a rotation to apply automatically.
Default crop frame is whole image

New in 4.2 * Date-Picker that supports dates down to 0AD as well as partial dates * HTML descriptions display correctly with click to edit * Preference for pre-selecting whole image when cropping * Preference for auto-rotating images from camera * Preference to use external cropping tool (experimental) * Added more items to the options menus * French translation updates (Imkal) * German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr) * Russian translation updates (Nick Silin) * Updated OK/Cancel button positions to conform to current Android standards * Full keyboard available when entering ASINs * Keeps 5 previous export files * Better detection of 'changes' when editing books * Support for a wider range of Gallery and file browsers * More reliable date handling on import/export/sync * Fix handling of duplicate anthology titles * Various bugs fixed Many thanks to our dedicated beta testers and translators! Blame Grunthos for all bugs and errors. And send us bug reports.
New in 4.2.1\n\n * Fix crash when expanding list items and using \'Expand All\'\n\n

It looks like your existing barcode scanner app is not compatible with Book Catalogue. We recommend installing the Zxing barcode scanner application, and if it is already installed, we recommend uninstalling it and reinstalling it.

New in 4.2.2 * Fix tiling of background image for some Android versions * Better handling of incompatible scanner apps * Send more details on crash or when asking for help * Cleanup of layouts (Nick Silin) * Bug fixes
New in 4.2.3\n\n * Improve handling of invalid ISBNs when sending to goodreads\n\n * Other minor bug fixes\n\n
Beep if scanned ISBN is valid

New in 4.2.4 * A non-editable view of book details, with 'fling' support! (See "Other Preferences") (Nick Silin) * Support for pic2shop scanner (better for fixed focus, low light and in front-facing cameras) * Check internet connection earlier when trying to scan books * More German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr) * More French translation updates (Djiko) * Bug fixes
When you click on an item in this list, you can now choose to go to non-editable book details view. See "Other Preferences" for the relevant setting.
This is the non-editable book details screen; you can fling/swipe left or right to navigate to other books, and you can edit the book via the options menu using the menu button or overflow menu icon.

Please note that this is not a full backup. It does not contain cover images. 

For a complete backup you need to copy the contents of the 'bookCatalogue' directory from your SD card to another location. 

See our FAQ (a web link is under 'Help') for detailed instructions.

It looks like you have already authorized this app. If you would like to delete the credentials from this phone, then you can do so by pressing the button below. But it is also important to de-authorize the application at the goodreads website as well. \n\nForgetting the credentials here will remove the goodreads option from the main application menu.
A %3$s file called %2$s was created in the \"%1$s\" directory on your SD card.\n\nYou should manually copy it elsewhere to protect the data in case your device is damaged, lost, or stolen.
Please select a file that is not a directory

New in 5.0.0 * A non-editable view of book details, with 'fling' support! (See "Other Preferences") (Nick Silin) * Archiving (Backup & Import) of entire catalogue, including books, covers, preferences and styles * Updated interface with Action Bar support for usability and to work better on devices without menu buttons * Support for pic2shop scanner (better for fixed focus, low light and in front-facing cameras) * goodreads now appears in main menu if you authorize it * Check internet connection earlier when trying to scan books * More German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr) * More French translation updates (Imkal & Djiko) * More Russian translation updates (Nick Silin) * Internal changes in anticipation of an improved tablet interface * Bug fixes
Show first level heading and number of books
Please check that the SD Card is writable, and has sufficient space.
Please check that the SD Card is accessible.
New in 5.0.3\n\n * Bug fixes\n\n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n\n
New in 5.0.4\n\n * New field: Language\n\n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n\n * Bug fixes\n\n
New in 5.0.5\n\n * "Added Date" List now sorted in reverse order \n\n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n\n * Bug fixes\n\n
The books in this archive will be imported. Click on one of two options to start the import, or press \'back\' to cancel:
All books in the archive will be imported, updating existing books and adding new ones.
Only import books that are new, or which have been updated more recently in the archive. This is useful when synchronizing two devices.
This option is not supported for older archive versions.
The books in your catalogue will be exported. Click on one of two options to start the export, or press \'back\' to cancel:
All books in the catalogue will be exported to the archive.
Only export books that are new, or which have been updated since the last full backup. This is useful when synchronizing two devices.
